name.en: Freshman English as an Introduction to Humanities and Social Sciences
name.ch: 大一英文:人文社會課群

goal.ch:
Listening
1. I can understand the main ideas of what is said to me in standard spoken English. 
2. I can understand the main ideas of most audios and videos of familiar topics.
3. I can follow a lecture or talk within my own field if the presentation is clear.
SPEAKING - Spoken Production
4. I can give a clear, prepared presentation about topics I am interested in and provide detailed descriptions.
5. I can express my opinion on an issue by giving reasons, talking about
 the advantages and disadvantages, or analyzing cause and effect.
SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction
6. I can interact quite fluently and naturally in conversations.
7. I can, with some effort, keep up with and contribute to group discussions.
READING
8. I can scan quickly through long and complex texts and find the details I want.
9. I can search and browse various sources to obtain relevant information.
10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my interest.
11. I can understand the writer’s point of view when reading an article.
WRITING
12. I can write an essay with reasonably accurate spelling and punctuation.
13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions and proper details.
14. I can write an essay combining the ideas from multiple sources.
15. I can write an essay giving reasons to support my point of view.
goal.en:
Listening
1. I can understand the main ideas of what is said to me in standard spoken English. 
2. I can understand the main ideas of most audios and videos of familiar topics.
3. I can follow a lecture or talk within my own field if the presentation is clear.
SPEAKING - Spoken Production
4. I can give a clear, prepared presentation about topics I am interested in and provide detailed descriptions.
5. I can express my opinion on an issue by giving reasons, talking about
 the advantages and disadvantages, or analyzing cause and effect.
SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction
6. I can interact quite fluently and naturally in conversations.
7. I can, with some effort, keep up with and contribute to group discussions.
READING
8. I can scan quickly through long and complex texts and find the details I want.
9. I can search and browse various sources to obtain relevant information.
10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my interest.
11. I can understand the writer’s point of view when reading an article.
WRITING
12. I can write an essay with reasonably accurate spelling and punctuation.
13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions and proper details.
14. I can write an essay combining the ideas from multiple sources.
15. I can write an essay giving reasons to support my point of view.

gradMethod.ch:
ESP自學小組（口頭報告、寫作等）30％
期末考試 20％      
英語自學活動 5％
檢定考 5％
課堂活動評量 40％

ch: 系所:限中國文學系、法國語文學系、文學院學士班、客家語文暨社會科學學系。年級:限一年級。身份:限非交換生。
en: Department:Department of Chinese Literature、Department of French、Interdisciplinary Program of Liberal Arts、Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences only.Year:First Year only.identity:Non-Exchange Students Only.
